Articles.Content: Uh, what is this..... i don't even......... Forum: http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php waaaat? warning: if you wish to keep your sanity, proceed with caution...
Yeah, i'm lucky not to have met one of the "Believers" in real life.
I'd probably knock a believers teeth down their throat if they said something to me :|
You realise there's probably not one person on there that actually believes in any of it? It got so many trolls they've just taken over the whole thing.
The best bit is the explanation for phases of the moon; migratory, bioluminescent moon shrimp.

Close due to this thread being a rules violation.
